lexUnit.name: argument.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a heated exchange of diverging or opposite views.

sentence.text: Falk advances these principles in the awareness that , pending the actual abolition of nuclear weapons , a different , and much more dangerous conclusion can be drawn from the argument about the illegality of nuclear weapons .
